name: MilkingTime
description:
The leaderboard is only available in the desktop version Management: Esc - output How to milk cows? -  The composition of the game:
  • drag the cows into the milking machines, wait a bit and return them to the conveyor belt
  •  carefully do not drop them on the ground 
  •  collect milk from milking machines and sell it at a favorable rate 
  •  compete for the title of the richest milker!
Creators Чаисус (Code, Graphics, etc.) Thrimas (Audio designer)
